arabic_text: قُلۡ بِفَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَفۡرَحُواْ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ
translation: Say, “By Allah’s grace and His mercy let them therefore rejoice. It is much better than what they accumulate[47].”
footnotes: [47] “The mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate” See 43:32.
